workflow.name: Subsidy hunter: GPT-4o analysis & scoring with Google News & Chatwork alerts
workflow.description:
**Description:** Automate your grant research with an AI Agent that reads, analyzes, and scores opportunities. üèõÔ∏èü§ñ

This advanced workflow transforms the tedious task of finding business subsidies into an automated intelligence stream. Unlike simple keyword scrapers, it uses an OpenAI Agent (GPT-4o) to read full articles, extract key details (deadlines, budgets), and evaluate their importance for SMEs on a 1-10 scale.

## Key Features:

Intelligent Scoring: The AI assigns an "Importance Score" and "Urgency" level to each subsidy, filtering out noise.

Structured Data Extraction: Converts unstructured news text into clean JSON (Deadlines, Requirements, Agencies).

Smart Alerts: High-scoring subsidies (Score 7+) trigger a priority alert (üö®) sent directly to Chatwork.

State Management: Uses Google Sheets to track history and prevent duplicate notifications.

Organized Layout: Nodes are clearly grouped into sections (Setup, Aggregation, Analysis, Logic) for easy customization.

## How it works:

Aggregate: Collects the latest articles from Google News, J-Net21, and Mirasapo Plus RSS feeds.

Analyze: The AI Agent reads the content to extract fields like applicationDeadline and targetRecipients, while calculating an importance score.

Deduplicate: Checks the URL against a Google Sheet database to ensure only new information is processed.

Filter & Tag: High-value items are automatically tagged as "High Priority".

Notify: Saves data to Google Sheets and sends a formatted message to Chatwork.

## Setup Requirements:

Google Sheets: Create a sheet named Subsidies with the following headers in the first row: subsidyName, targetRecipients, applicationDeadline, budgetAmount, urgency, importanceScore, priorityTag, sourceUrl

## Credentials:

OpenAI: API Key (GPT-4o recommended).

Chatwork: API Token.

Google Sheets: OAuth2 connection.

Configuration: Open the "Sticky Note Setup" section (first node) and enter your Chatwork Room ID, Chatwork API Token, and Google Spreadsheet ID.

workflow.name: AI Subsidy Hunter: Intelligent Scoring & Alert System (Fixed Layout)

parameters.content:
## 1. Setup & Trigger
Defines the schedule (9 AM daily) and holds all configuration variables like API keys and room IDs.

## 2. Data Aggregation
Collects subsidy news from Google News and government RSS feeds (J-Net21, Mirasapo), then merges them into a single list.

## 3. AI Analysis
Extracts the article URL, fetches the full text, and uses **GPT-4o** to analyze, structure, and score the subsidy (1-10).

## 4. Logic, Filter & Notify
Checks for duplicates in Google Sheets, filters by importance score (High/Normal), and sends a formatted alert to Chatwork.

options.systemMessage:
You are an expert grant analyst. 
Your task:
1. Extract key subsidy info (focusing on upcoming fiscal years).
2. **EVALUATE** the subsidy's importance for SMEs (Small/Medium Enterprises).
   - Assign an 'importanceScore' (1-10) based on budget size, ease of application, and coverage.
   - Assign 'urgency' (High/Medium/Low) based on deadlines.
3. Return structured JSON.

Fields:
- subsidyName, fiscalYear, targetRecipients, applicationDeadline, budgetAmount, requiredDocuments, administeringAgency, eligibilityCriteria
- importanceScore (number)
- urgency (string)

parameters.content:
# AI Subsidy Hunter: Intelligent Scoring & Alert

## Overview
This workflow goes beyond simple scraping. It uses **OpenAI (GPT-4o)** to analyze subsidy/grant information from Google News and RSS feeds, scoring them based on importance for SMEs.

## How it works
1. **Collect:** Aggregates info from Google News, J-Net21, and Mirasapo Plus.
2. **Analyze (AI Agent):** GPT-4o extracts key details and calculates an `importanceScore` (1-10) and `urgency`.
3. **Filter:** Checks Google Sheets to prevent duplicates.
4. **Prioritize:** If the score is 7 or higher, it tags the alert as "High Priority" (üö®).
5. **Notify:** Saves to Google Sheets and sends a formatted alert to Chatwork.

## Setup Steps
1. **Google Sheets:** Create a sheet named `Subsidies` with these headers:
   - `subsidyName`, `targetRecipients`, `applicationDeadline`, `budgetAmount`, `urgency`, `importanceScore`, `priorityTag`, `sourceUrl`
2. **Credentials:** Connect **OpenAI**, **Google Sheets**, and obtain your **Chatwork API Token**.
3. **Configuration:** Open the **"Workflow Configuration"** node and enter your `Chatwork Room ID`, `API Token`, and `Google Sheet ID`.

## Requirements
- OpenAI API Key
- Chatwork Account
- Google Sheets

user.name: NODA shuichi
user.bio:
Web Marketer & Automation Consultant

With a background in web production at Recruit and over a decade of experience serving major enterprises, I specialize in combining Web Marketing with AI Automation. I help businesses adopt "new ways of working" through digital transformation.

My Expertise:

Web Marketing: GA4 migration and in-house team training.

AI Automation: Using tools like n8n to streamline marketing and back-office workflows for maximum efficiency.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
